name: INTICS Group
tag_list: analytics, intelligent-analytics, bi, business-intelligence, risk, credit-risk, market-risk, econometrics, crm, customer-relationship-management, decision-support
overview:
INTICS Group provide solutions and services on enterprise level in business intelligence and analytics for the financial services industry.

We specialise in resolving critical technology and business issues in the following key areas:

  • Business Intelligence (BI) - we can help you to integrate BI into your business process management by monitoring KPIs, dashboards and provide decision support for the analysis of underlying data and trends.

  • Risk Management - Market Risk, Credit Risk and Enterprise Portfolio Management.

  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM) typically involves tracking individual customer behaviour, and using this knowledge to configure solutions tailored to the customers’ needs.

  • Analytics - applying predictive modelling and wide range of quantitative, qualitative and judgmental methods.
